title: Question 20
prompt:
Sentence 4: Connie Parsons will deliver a review of the firm’s financial performance during the past year and projections through next may.

Which correction should be made to sentence 4?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
The word may, when not capitalized, is a modal, or helping verb, indicating a formal request or granting of permission. In this sentence, though, the word May is the name of the calendar month May. The months of the year are always capitalized, so the word May should be capitalized.
Connie Parsons will deliver a review of the firm’s financial performance during the past year and projections through next May.
